summary: This document contains subscriber information for Jeffrey E. Epstein, detailing his account with Cingular Wireless. It includes personal details, account status, and billing information, as well as a record of voice usage over several days in July 2006. This document contains detailed billing usage records for a Cingular Wireless account, including call logs, voicemail usage, and charges incurred during specific dates in July 2006. It highlights various incoming and outgoing calls, including locations and types of calls made. This document contains detailed billing usage records for a Cingular Wireless account, including call times, durations, and charges. The records primarily focus on calls made on July 13 and July 14, 2006, with numerous entries indicating calls to and from various locations, including New York and the United Kingdom. This document contains detailed billing information for voice usage on a Cingular Wireless account, including call dates, times, numbers called, and charges incurred. The records indicate numerous incoming and outgoing calls primarily to and from the United Kingdom and France during July 15-20, 2006. This document contains a detailed billing statement for voice usage on a Cingular Wireless account, listing numerous incoming and outgoing calls, including international calls to France and the United Kingdom. The data includes timestamps, call types, and charges associated with each call, providing insight into the communication patterns of the account holder during the specified billing cycle. This document contains detailed billing usage records for a Cingular Wireless account, including call times, durations, and locations. The records span several days in July 2006 and include various incoming and outgoing calls, voicemail messages, and call waiting instances. This document contains detailed billing usage records for a Cingular Wireless account, including voice and text usage from July 26 to July 29, 2006. It provides insights into the frequency and nature of calls made, including incoming and outgoing calls, voicemail usage, and text messaging activity. This document contains detailed billing information for mobile phone usage, including GPRS and SMS usage, for a specific account during July 2006. It outlines the dates, times, and charges associated with various communications, including international calls and text messages. This document contains unbilled usage reports from Cingular Wireless, detailing voice and GPRS/Text usage for a specific account. The data includes call times, durations, and charges, indicating that it may not represent a complete record of all calls due to possible data losses.
